=== 용어 ===
Code Rank
| cr | Code Rank |
| rcr | Reverse Code Rank |

Class Level
| dit | depth of inheritance tree |
| impl | implemented interfaces |
| cis | class interface size |
| csz | class size |
| vars | properties |
| varsi | properties inherit |
| varsnp | properties non private |
| wmc | weighted methods |
| wmci | weighted methods inherit |
| wmcnp | weighted methods non private |

coupling
| calls | calls |
| fanout | fanout |

cyclomatic Complexity
| ccn | cyclomatic complexity 1 |
| ccn2 | cyclomatic complexity 2 |

dependency
| tc | number of classes | |
| cc | number of concrete classes | |
| ac | number of abstract classes | |
| ca | afferent coupling | 이 클래스에 의존하는 클래스 |
| ce | efferent coupling | 이 클래스가 의존하는 클래스 |
| a | abstraction | |
| i | instability | |
| d | distance | |

hierarchy
| clsa | number of abstract classes |
| clsc | number of concrete classes |
| roots | number of root classes |
| leafs | number of leaf classes |
| dit | inheritance depth |
| maxdit | maximum inheritance depth |

inheritance
| andc | average number derived classes |
| ahh | average hierarchy height |

nPath Complexity
| npath | npath complexity |

node Count
| nop | number of packages |
| noc | number of classes |
| noi | number of interfaces |
| nom | number of methods |
| nof | number of functions |

node LOC
| loc | lines of code |
| cloc | comment lines of code |
| eloc | executable lines of code |
| ncloc | non comment lines of code |

See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_package_metrics

=== 복잡도 ===
* Cyclomatic complexity: M = E - N + 2P
** E: 분기에 따른 edge
** N: 노드의 갯수
** P: edge로 이어진 덩어리의 갯수
